message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you at a price of $20,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point.
Hi Alice, thanks for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit too high for me. Would you be willing to come down to $12,000?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $20,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $17,000 for a quick sale. This is my final offer.

Hi Alice, thanks for getting back to me. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  While I understand the value of the product, $17,000 is still a bit over my budget.  Could we possibly settle at $14,000?
